TIM BODYKA HENG

hey it's tim and I can show you da wae.

a ux/ui designer + front-end developer who's addicted to coffee but dislikes coffeescript. I'm very passionate about digital design and also a lowkey admirer of everyday design.

full-time chelsea supporter, pop-culture junkie and master of memes.

get in touch with me if you have any interesting projects you have in mind.

ps: if all else fails, send an owl.
